body: TF_BUILTIN(ArrayIncludes, ArrayIncludesIndexofAssembler) { ... } and TF_BUILTIN(ArrayIncludesPackedDoubles, ...) in builtins-array-gen.cc show fast-paths for array includes. Key preconditions: BranchIfFastJSArrayForRead(receiver, context, &init_index, &call_runtime); LoadFastJSArrayLength, bounds checks; LoadElementsKind -> dispatch to SMI/objects/packed doubles/holey doubles; For SMI or object: TaggedIsSmi checks, IsUndefined handling (includes treats hole as undefined), SameValueZero semantics for NaN handled in heap_num and nan_loop branches; For double arrays: Handle NaN loops and hole as undefined, SIMD fast path via ExternalReference; Deopt paths: call_runtime fallback, various GotoIf checks leading to Runtime::kArrayIncludes_Slow. Prototype guards: IsNoElementsProtectorCellInvalid checks before using fast paths in some clones; ElementsKind checks use LoadElementsKind and comparisons; For TypedArray includes: Builtin TypedArrayPrototypeIncludes in builtins-typed-array.cc uses JSTypedArray::Validate, len==0 check, CapRelativeIndex, Calls ElementsAccessor::IncludesValue which calls into elements implementations (objects/elements.*). Typed array fast paths in builtins-array-gen.cc include TypedArray helpers (ValidateTypedArray, LoadJSTypedArrayLengthAndCheckDetached etc). TypedArray TQ defines EnsureAttached, LoadTypedElement, etc. Typed array checks include WasDetached(), IsVariableLength/IsOutOfBounds, RAB/GSAB handling and DetachedOrOutOfBounds labels. js-native-context-specialization.cc: ReduceElementAccess and BuildElementAccess path perform map checks, TransitionElementsKindOrCheckMap, CheckMaps, DependOnNoElementsProtector for fast arrays, and try to lower to LoadFixedDoubleArrayElement/LoadFixedArrayElement or LoadFixedTypedArrayElementAsTagged for typed arrays; it adds MapGuard/CheckMaps and may emit DeoptimizeReason checks (WrongMap, CowArrayElementsChanged, WrongEnumIndices, WrongInstanceType). ICs: src/ic/* contain inline cache handlers (KeyedLoadIC/LoadIC) used by property accesses but not directly referenced due to search limits. objects/elements.* and js-array.* define element kinds, holey vs packed behaviors, SameValueZero semantics and handling of holes and NaN. File lines: builtins-array-gen.cc lines 900-1280 approx
explanation: Collects key fast-path checks and semantics for Array.prototype.includes and TypedArray.prototype.includes: receiver fast-array checks, elements kind branching, SameValueZero/NaN, hole treated as undefined, typed array detached/out-of-bounds/resizable checks, deopt paths, and compiler lowering safeguards.
